mutants.code:
def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 1
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p + min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y + min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = -1
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p + min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y + min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 0
    black_cost = 0

    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p + min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 0
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p - min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y + min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 0
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p * min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y + min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 0
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p + min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b - min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y + min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)

        new_yellow_cost = y + min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost

        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 0
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p + min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y - min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(colors, N):
    pink_cost = 0
    black_cost = 0
    yellow_cost = 0
    for (p, b, y) in colors:
        new_pink_cost = p + min(black_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_black_cost = b + min(pink_cost, yellow_cost)
        new_yellow_cost = y * min(pink_cost, black_cost)
        pink_cost = new_pink_cost
        black_cost = new_black_cost
        yellow_cost = new_yellow_cost
    return min(pink_cost, black_cost, yellow_cost)
